nodes.text: The orbital autocannon (or orbital auto cannon), also known as an orbital bombardment cannon, was a starship weapon used for large-scale bombardments. The Mandator IV-class Siege Dreadnought used by the First Order was equipped with two such cannons. The cannons on the Siege Dreadnought Fulminatrix were used to destroy the Resistance base on D'Qar, with only four shots fired.
